description:
Hopelessly romantic. I wish you health and happiness. I value a good heart more than a pretty face. Live a happy and meaningful life every day with a grateful heart. The connotation of beauty is good temper.True love is having feelings and communicating with each other, sharing love. Looking forward to each other's company. It's good to be young at heart. Gentle, caring, patient, loving. No bad habits, smoking, excessive drinking, playing cards. I stay in shape. A woman who loves to cook loves her man ❤️

Hobbies
Reading, music, Internet, travelling, cooking
